Title: Missions
Plot: The team's plan to con an auction house with a comic book forgery goes awry when corrupt copper, Sam Phillips (played by Fay Ripley), decides she wants in on the play.
GuestStars: William Scott-Masson, Stan Rowe, Evelyn Duah, Fay Ripley, Gerrard McArthur, Gregory Floy, Michael Smiley, Nicholas Palliser, Jake Nightingale, Mark Tandy, Kieran Bew
